Constructor Detail

Convertor

public Convertor(boolean useCMLIDs,
                 java.lang.String prefix)
Constructs a CML convertor.

Parameters:
useCMLIDs - Uses object IDs like 'a1' instead of 'a<hash>'.
prefix - Namespace prefix to use. If null, then no prefix is used;
